SectionBody.Text: Upon completion of each home inspection for compensation, the home inspector shall provide a written report prepared for the client.

Paragraph.Text: On those systems and components inspected that, in the professional opinion of the inspector, are significantly deficient or are near the end of their service lives.
If not self-evident, a reason why the system or component reported under paragraph (a) is significantly deficient or near the end of its service life.
Any systems and components that were present at the time of the inspection but were not inspected, and a reason they were not inspected.

Subsection.Text: A home inspector is not required to provide estimates related to the cost of repair of an inspected property.
